#summary Data structure of Handle

== Handle Data Structure ==

Essentially a handle record is a set of values. Each value is a tuple with 7 fields: index, type, data, ttl, permission, timestamp, reference. See [http://www.apps.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3651.html#sec-3.1 RFC 3651] for details.

§ Simple values.

§1 'Simple' value UTF8 string - length plus string.

§2 'Simple' value UTF8 string for *some* user types (e.g. 'URL') - length plus string.
